feed.title: Nextcloud Talk Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.0.4
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(schedule-meeting): Make sure the other user is in one-to-one when scheduling #14973 #14967
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Improve dialog when scheduling in one-to-one #14923
  • fix(schedule-meeting): Hide schedule meeting from former one-to-one #14923
  • fix(performance): Fix unnecessary user_status requests from avatar component #14932

What's Changed

* [stable31.0] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14932 * [stable31.0] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.25.1 to 8.26.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14942 * [stable31.0] fix(CalendarEventsDialog): adjust UI based on conversation type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14923 * [stable31.0] fix: show schedule meeting invite option for fresh 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14973 * [stable31.0] fix(scheduling): Enforce one-to-one participants before scheduling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14967 * [stable31.0] chore(release): Changelog for 21.0.4 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14977

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.0.3...v21.0.4

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.7
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(call): Fix missing call notification when SIP dial-in is starting a call #14991
  • fix(chat): Improve regex of todo-list handling also uppercase X #14903
  • fix(one-to-one): Add the other participant when sharing a file in one-to-one #14850
  • fix(performance): Fix unnecessary user_status requests from avatar component #14934

What's Changed

* [stable30] fix(chat): Ensure one-to-one is filled when sharing a file by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14850 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14866 * [stable30] test: Fix broken scenario by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14853 * [stable30] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14901 * [stable30] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14903 * [stable30] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14906 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14956 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14960 * [stable30] fix(sip): Fix SIP dial-in starting a call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14991 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15009 * [stable30] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15011 * [stable30] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @Antreesy in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14934 * [stable30] fix: Print error code and message for unhandled signaling errors by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15023 * [stable30] Add more information to PeerConnectionAnalyzer logs by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15031 * [stable30] Handle invalid client type when trying to start a recording by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15043 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.23 to 9.2.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15066 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15068 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.2 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15065 * [stable30] fix: throttle participants request instead of debouncing by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15088 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.24 to 9.2.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15125 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.127 to 7.0.128 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15126 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15133 * [stable30] fix(openapi): Remove unused return documentation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15144 * [stable30] chore(tests): Cleanup bootstrap.php to be forward-compatible by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15153 * build(deps): Bump webrtc-adapter from 9.0.1 to 9.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14916 * chore(release): Add changelog for 20.1.7 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15198

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.6...v20.1.7

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.1.0
entry.content:
Added

  • üìÖ Improve handling of event conversations: filtered until close to the meeting, default expiration, tracking of event name and description
  • üë• Allow adding participants to one-to-one calls creating a new conversation
  • üç± Add a Talk Dashboard
  • üìá Enhance right sidebar in one-to-one conversations with information about the participant
  • üì≤ Allow SIP direct dial-in to start a new conversation with an existing Nextcloud account
  • üñåÔ∏è Allow to provide custom images for virtual backgrounds for branding or corporate appearance
  • üîà Allow selecting the output device in the media settings
  • ‚òéÔ∏è Administration setting to enable SIP dial-in by default for new conversations
  • üìÖ Allow creating instant meetings
  • üîè Add sensitive conversations which don't show a chat messages in sublines and notifications
  • üì≤ Add option to mark a conversation as important to still receive notifications during "Do not disturb"

Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

What's Changed

* [stable31] feat: emit amount of unread messages to display the badge in Talk Desktop by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14867 * Revert "[stable31] ci: Generate authoritative classmap again" by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14845 * [stable31] fix(Conversation): refactor subname rendering, get rid of v-html by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14870 * [stable31] feat(conversation): Add new API endpoint that allows to provide all s‚Ä¶ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14869 * [stable31] feat(conversation): Send switch-to signaling message when creating fr‚Ä¶ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14871 * [stable31] feat: allow to create new conversation from one-to-one by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14872 * [stable31] feat(LeftSidebar): transform filters to chips by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14873 * [stable31] feat(conversations): Add "Important conversations" which still notify‚Ä¶ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14879 * [stable31] fix(conversation): Add route for important conversation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14884 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.24.0 to 8.25.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14893 * [stable31] fix(outOfOffice): show expand button during call by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14899 * [stable31] fix(message): improve regexp for interactive todo items by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14905 * [stable31] fix(federation): respect remote capabilities when show "Notify about calls" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14908 * [stable31] chore(release): Add changelog for 21.0.3 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14912 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14921 * [stable31] fix: do not make extra requests to user_status by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14933 * [stable31] fix(conversations): do not add second participant to extended 1-1 twice by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14938 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow to enable SIP by default by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14940 * [stable31] chore(deps): bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.25.1 to 8.26.0 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14943 * build(deps): Bump vue-tsc from 2.2.8 to 2.2.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14952 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14957 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14959 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14963 * [stable31] fix(CalendarEventsDialog): adjust UI based on conversation type by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14924 * [stable31] fix(scheduling): Enforce one-to-one participants before scheduling by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14968 * [stable31] fix: show schedule meeting invite option for fresh 1-1 conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14974 * [stable31] chore(release): Changelog for 21.0.4 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14979 * [stable31] fix(conversation): Fix missing return by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14975 * [stable31] fix(lobby): Allow setting the lobby on event and extended conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14982 * [stable31] feat(calls): Allow to provide branded talk-backgrounds via themes by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14987 * [stable31] test: Fix flaky test conversation order by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14989 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow adding, removing and importing phone numbers by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14993 * [stable31] feat(sip): Allow the sipbridge to create a conversation with a user for a phone number by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/14992 * [stable31] feat(conversations): handle event conversation rooms by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15017 * [stable31] feat(retention): Allow defining a default retention for event and phone conversations by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15018 * [stable31] feat: üç± Talk Dashboard - ‚öôÔ∏è API by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15019 * [stable31] feat(sidebar): mutual upcoming events API by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15022 * [stable31] fix: Print error code and message for unhandled signaling errors by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15024 * [stable31] Add more information to PeerConnectionAnalyzer logs by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15032 * [stable31] fix(events): Don't apply retention before the event happened by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15033 * [stable31] feat: add selector for Audio Output üîà by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15037 * [stable31] feat(conversations): handle event conversation by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15035 * [stable31] feat: make default conversation avatars square by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15041 * [stable31] fix: do not show event-room actions for non-moderators by @backportbot in feat(reminders): Add API endpoint to get upcoming reminders by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15045 * [stable31] feat(RightSidebar): improve appearance, show profile details by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15050 * [stable31] chore(release): Changelog for 21.1.0-rc.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15048 * build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.2 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15057 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.23 to 9.2.24 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15058 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15067 * [stable31] getValue by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15078 * [stable31] fix: no user in background jobs and appointment links by @backportbot in tests by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15169 * [stable31] fix(object-rooms): Add an index on the room object columns by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15171 * [stable31] feat(experiments): Allow testing some experimental features per instance by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15174 * by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15175 * [stable31] fix(dashboard): Fix event list when limit is reached by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15177 * for retention of object conversations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15185 * [stable31] test: make Jest fail on console.warn / console.error by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15186 * [stable31] fix(RightSidebar): adjust profile info expanding logic by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15188 * build(deps): Bump the frontend skip the user_status request on jo‚Ä¶ by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15190 * [stable31] fix(lobby): Only show relative time for 24h by @backportbot in entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v20.1.8
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(chat): Remove items from the shared items list when a message is deleted #15222
  • fix(chat): Allow deleting shared call recordings #15241
  • fix(federation): Fix sending invites from conversations without an owner #15353
  • fix(settings): Do not break when settings has an incomplete server URL #15452

What's Changed

* [stable30] chore(i18n): Adapted name of North Macedonia by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15208 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15220 * [stable30] fix: reset shared items from a deleted message by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15222 * [stable30] fix: correctly handle audio/video recordings in messages by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15241 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15273 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.26 to 9.2.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15342 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.128 to 7.0.129 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15343 * [stable30] fix(ParticipantService): fix sending a federation invite from room with no owner by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15353 * [stable30] test: Test server branch "fix/files_sharing/hide-own-reshares" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15443 * [stable30] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15441 * [stable30] fix(config): Don't break with incomplete server URLs by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15452 * [stable30] chore(release): Add changelog for 20.1.8 by @nickvergessen in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15458

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v20.1.7...v20.1.8

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Talk: v21.1.1
entry.content:
Changed

  • Update translations
  • Update dependencies

Fixed

  • fix(chat): Always render code blocks left-to-right #15364
  • fix(call): Allow end-to-end encrypted calls in integrations like files and sharing #15415
  • fix(sip): Add log message when direct dial-in had no match to help configuring phone numbers #15358
  • fix(federation): Fix sending invites from conversations without an owner #15354
  • fix(settings): Show errors when the websocket connection could not be opened #15368
  • fix(settings): Validate that signaling private and public key match #15357
  • fix(settings): Do not break when settings has an incomplete server URL #15453

What's Changed

* build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/eslint-config from 9.0.0-rc.1 to 9.0.0-rc.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15314 * [stable31] fix: migrate to getCSPNonce by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15326 * [stable31] fix: show 1-1 attendee as inactive, if room was just created by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15330 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder from 9.2.26 to 9.2.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15337 * build(deps): Bump extendable-media-recorder-wav-encoder from 7.0.128 to 7.0.129 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15338 * build(deps): Bump entities from 6.0.0 to 6.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15339 * [stable31] fix(ParticipantService): fix sending a federation invite from room with no owner by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15354 * [stable31] Verify signaling token keys by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15357 * [stable31] fix(sip): Log an info when direct dial-in has no search hit by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15358 * [stable31] feat(web): always render code blocks LTR by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15364 * [stable31] fix(AdminSettings): show errors in UI when testing websocket connection by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15368 * [stable31] fix(call): do not hide participants videos if not initialised yet by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15383 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15394 * [stable31] Update Nextcloud OpenAPI types by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15397 * [stable31] fix: allow encrypted calls in Talk integrations by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15415 * [stable31] chore(eslint): use complete config on lint by @ShGKme in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15420 * [stable31] fix(TalkDashboard): make home button a link for a11y and UX and add refresh function by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15385 * [stable31] fix(dashboard): throttle events to update with Home button by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15432 * [stable31] test: Test server branch "fix/files_sharing/hide-own-reshares" by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15444 * [stable31] Update nextcloud/ocp dependency by @nextcloud-command in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15440 * [stable31] fix(config): Don't break with incomplete server URLs by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15453 * [stable31] chore(release): Add changelog for 21.1.1 by @backportbot in https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/pull/15456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/spreed/compare/v21.1.0...v21.1.1
